amendment.description: To provide additional funding for title I of the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965.

action.text: Amendment SA 2275 proposed by Senator Byrd.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 2275.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 2275 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 44 - 51. Record Vote Number: 269.
Amendment SA 2275 ruled out of order by the chair.
